msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: + P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the right hand side. Kollesis at the left hand side. There are some lacunae and damaged at the beginning and the middle of the column at the result of two vertical folds. As most of the column of Tax Rolls, the lower part is irregularly cut. Although the papyrus has suffered damagge and some lacunae at the column, yet the rest of the column is in a very good condition. No restorattion is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one either by underlining the name of the taxpayer or with an oblique stroke going downwards to the left edge. (MA)
